title: BoJ in uneasy spot as Japanese inflation lags
text:
BoJ in uneasy spot as Japanese inflation lags 2:35pm GMT - 01:40 
Japan's inflation in December continued to lag a strong economic revival, leaving the central bank in a dilemma on how to turn off crisis-era stimulus policies that even some of its own board members warn will start to hurt more than help if retained for too long. David Pollard reports.

David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2nfICsN
